title: please help - does anyone recognize these????????
content:
please help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211219im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/alps_5393.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211219im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/tomyboy_5293.jpg)

 [‹ Something by Hendrik Werkman](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211219/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41760 "Go to previous forum topic") [Easy one I should imagine - London Zoo Penguin Pool ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211219/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41797 "Go to next forum topic")
author: neill k

comments.content:
I love it when you snore - Bauhaus heavy  
Paal Nilssen... - Bauhaus Light
last dance might be chalet London 1970 modified.

The “s” is different than ITC Bauhaus,  
I think it is Bauhaus 93.

Actually last dance is Pump Light: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pump-lt/light/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211219/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pump-lt/light/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pump-lt/light/")
This is a great ressource: [Bowfin Printworks’ Bauhaus-style Font Identification Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211219/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces.html).
